name: Orange Tree Digital
overview:
Orange Tree is a digital marketing consultancy based in Manchester, serving clients in the North West, across the UK and overseas.

They work for SMEs, 3rd Sector organisations, and new business start-ups.

Lead consultant is Michael Wignall, a digital strategist and SEO with 14 years of experience.

Their services include strategy, audits, research, planning, SEO and PPC campaigns, conversion optimisation and usability, content and training.

If and when other skills are required they will source, negotiate prices with, brief and manage other suppliers.

They are members of Manchester Digital trade association.
